subTitle: Live streaming never been so easy ;)

description.part1: Create your live, interact with the public, manage resources and earnings IORA on the same platform.
description.part2: All unified to make your day easier!

whatisPraora.part2: which unifies all the resources you need to manage your lives and keep track of your cryptocurrencies earnings as a content producer.
whatisPraora.part3: You can easily start a live, create sweepstakes and sell products.

easyCreation: Praora wants to be a facilitator in the creation and dissemination of content through live streaming. Grow as a creator, develop your own community and closely follow your evolution as a streamer.
DoesntHaveToBeDifficult: It doesn't have to be difficult to do what you already like.
PublishAdsLives: Do you want to sell the digital design you produced live in a way fast and easy? On Praora, you can advertise on your live or leave your productions on your channel and sell them to the public.
WalletBlockChain: All through your digital wallet on blockchain
CreateNewOneOrImportyourown: Create a new one or import your own digital wallet to manage how much you earn on the platform. You can do transactions within Praora, in an uncomplicated and
EarninginIBRLIORA: With the digital wallet, you can handle your earnings in iBRL, Ether or even our own currency.

ExclusiveOffer.part1: Stay on top of the list of investors, being the first to know about our whitepaper and get

QuestionOrSuggestions: If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us. We will be happy to help you!
SendUsMessage: or send to us your message
